ability.Apex Predator: This Pokemon's moves have 1.3x power to Pokemon with lower Speed stat.
ability.Enamel Armor: Reduces damage from Physical moves by 25%. If hit by a contact move, has a 20% chance to reduce target's Defense by 1 stage.

Tidal Crush.effect: Has a 20% chance to confuse the target.

Abyssal Bite.effect: Has a 50% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage.

Whale Song.effect: Increases the user's Attack and Speed by 1 stage each.

Dark Surge.effect: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.

Hydro Blast.effect: Has a 10% chance to confuse the target.
